original_text:
“If I have denied justice to any of my servants,
    whether male or female,
    when they had a grievance against me,
korean_text: 만일 남종이나 여종이 나와 더불어 쟁론할 때에 내가 그의 권리를 저버렸다면

sentences.original_text: If I have denied justice to any of my servants
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 내가 나의 종들 중 누구에게 정의를 거부했다면

sentences.original_text: when they had a grievance against me
